keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voice the desperate need for affordable housing solutions across Erewash and for the required care and support for the constituents in need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The ONLY consistent opposition to HS2
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes HS2 noting the existing billion plus pricetag could be spent improving the existing rail network and benefit everyone. Will push for cleaner, greener public transport for all.
Will make a stand for all Erewash and beloved green spaces, referencing opposition to the frackin and HS2N2 plans threatening to permanently destroy our wildlife and beloved green spaces.

issues.environment: Will make a stand for all Erewash and beloved green spaces, referencing opposition to the fracking and HS2N2 plans threatening to permanently destroy our wildlife and beloved green spaces.

housing.content: Voice the desperate need for affordable housing solutions across Erewash and for the required care and support for the constituents in need.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by T. MacManaway on behalf of Erewash Green Party, 4 Bristol Road, Ilkeston DE7 5HD
